exceptions.exn: The LHS of Z.add_opp_r (_ + - _)%Z does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Z.add_opp_r (_ + - _)%Z does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Cplus_assoc (_ + (_ + _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Cplus_opp_r (_ + - _) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Cplus_0_r (_ + 0) does not match any subterm of the goal
The LHS of Cplus_0_l (0 + _) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment H5 : forall x y z : C, x + (y + z) = x + y + z H4 : forall x : C, x + 0 = x H1 : forall x : C, x + - x = 0 H0 : forall x : C, 0 + x = x z1, z2 : C Unable to unify "- z1 + - z2" with "- (z2 + z1)".

original: unfold Cminus. rewrite Z.add_opp_r. rewrite Cplus_comm. rewrite Z.add_opp_r. rewrite Cplus_assoc. rewrite Cplus_opp_r. rewrite Cplus_0_r. rewrite Cplus_0_l. reflexivity.
